messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Funny kid quips
messages.msgSnippet: I ve posted lots of my favorite kids quips before, so I won t bore folks by posting them again.. But, while reading some of the folks have posted, I recalled
messages.messageBody:
I've posted lots of my favorite kids quips before, so I won't bore folks by
posting them again.. But, while reading some of the folks have posted, I
recalled another one. Actually, it was pretty sad, because it was the
misunderstanding of a grandson of a friend of my mother ( confusing huh.. lol) .. resulting
from his grandmother lying to him. ..

The kid was about 3, his grandmother told him that if he didnt take his
vitamins, his hair would fall out. ( I know, ridiculous) After meeting Landon,
who was about 6 mos old and totally bald, the little boy reprimanded me
firmly. "You need to give your baby more vitamins (shaking his little finger at
me)" Of course I had no idea what he was talking about til his Grandmother
told me about her vitamin taking ploy.

Teresa


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
